Articles.Content:
My own boatload of rockets.

Now there\'s an assortment of them that can be used by new users all the way up to the elite. 2 spacecraft have minor issues which in fact can turn into catastrophic failure and Loss of Life. (DPA2 has structural failure between the 4x-800 Liquid Fuel Engine Cluster and the Fat Boy Large Fuel Tank) (BDB3 has Linkage Failure Between SSH Series M-221 Solid Rocket Booster and the Advanced SAS have tried using struts to shore it up but it doesn\'t seem to take)

Use them and upgrade/modify them as you see fit!

Before downloading them make sure you have the 'Fatboy Large Fuel Tank' as most of the craft have them installed!

MOST IMPORTANT make sure you have the RCS and SAS toggled in the ON position before ignition. Unless, you know you like rockets doing loops and killing the poor kerbanauts!!
